languages.text: {n}Толпа в едином порыве, словно один человек, падает на колени перед вами. Лица людей искажены гримасами бессильной злобы и отчаянья от осознания того, что даже Император их предал. Вместо света Императора в их душах остались лишь зияющие дыры, готовые впустить в себя нового покровителя. Все до единого понимают — их никчемные судьбы в ваших руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Толпа в едином порыве, словно один человек, падает на колени перед вами. Лица людей искажены гримасами бессильной злобы и отчаянья от осознания того, что даже Император их предал. Вместо света Императора в их душах остались лишь зияющие дыры, готовые впустить в себя нового покровителя. Все до единого понимают — их никчемные судьбы в ваших руках.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа в едином порыве, словно один человек, падает на колени перед вами. Лица людей искажены гримасами бессильной злобы и отчаянья от осознания того, что даже Император их предал. Вместо света Императора в их душах остались лишь зияющие дыры, готовые впустить в себя нового покровителя. Все до единого понимают — их никчемные судьбы в ваших руках.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In a united urge, the crowd, all as one, falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. In their souls, where the Emperor's light once was, now only gaping hollows remain, waiting for a new patron to fill the void. All of them know now: their worthless fates are in your hands.{/n}

{n}In a united urge, the crowd, all as one, falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. In their souls, where the Emperor's light once was, now only gaping hollows remain, waiting for a new patron to fill the void. All of them know now: their worthless fates are in your hands.{/n}

In their souls, where the Emperor's light once was, there are now only gaping hollows waiting for a new patron to fill the void. All of them know now: their worthless fates are in your hands.{/n}

Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

{n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

languages.text: {n}群衆は本能的にひとつになり、あなたの前にひざまずく。皇帝にさえ裏切られたと悟り、無力な怒りと絶望の表情を浮かべている。彼らの魂の中の、かつて皇帝陛下の御光があった場所には今はただぽっかりと穴が開いており、その穴を埋める新たな後援者を待っている。一人残らず、彼らは自らの運命があなたの手に委ねられていることを知っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆はひとつになり、あなたの前にひざまずく。皇帝にさえ裏切られたと悟り、無力な怒りと絶望の表情を浮かべている。彼らの魂の中の、かつて皇帝陛下の御光があった場所には今はただぽっかりと穴が開いており、その穴を埋める新たな後援者を待っている。彼らの無価値な運命は、あなたの手に委ねられている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}所有人都心照不宣，跪在了你面前。你看着他们的眼睛，他们的目光中充满了无力的愤怒与绝望，因为他们意识到，就连帝皇也背叛了他们。他们灵魂中帝皇的明光熄灭了，只剩下一片空洞，等待着新的庇护主。所有人都意识到了这件事情——他们毫无价值的生命，如今完全掌握在你的手中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有人都心照不宣，跪在了你面前。你看着他们的眼睛，他们的目光中充满了无力的愤怒与绝望，因为他们意识到，就连帝皇也背叛了他们。他们灵魂中帝皇的明光熄灭了，只剩下一片空洞，等待着新的庇护主。所有人都意识到了这件事情——他们毫无价值的生命，如今完全掌握在你的手中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En un impulso unánime, la multitud cae a tus pies. Ves muecas de rabia impotente y desesperación al darse cuenta de que incluso el Emperador les ha traicionado. Donde la luz del Emperador iluminaba sus almas, ahora solo un vacío que podría llenar un nuevo patrón. Todos ellos saben que sus despreciables destinos están en tus manos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En un impulso unánime, la multitud, toda a una, cae a tus pies. Ves muecas de rabia impotente y desesperación al darse cuenta de que incluso el Emperador les ha traicionado. En sus almas, donde antes estaba la luz del Emperador, ahora solo hay huecos que esperan que alguien llene. Todos ellos saben ahora que sus despreciables destinos están en tus manos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dann sinkt die versammelte Menge vor dir auf die Knie. Du siehst Grimassen der machtlosen Wut und Verzweiflung ob der Erkenntnis, dass selbst der Imperator sie verraten hat. Wo einst das Licht des Imperators in ihren Seelen erstrahlte, wartet nun nur noch eine gähnende Leere auf einen neuen Schutzherren. Jeder Einzelne von ihnen weiß, dass ihr wertloses Schicksal in deinen Händen liegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wie durch einen einzigen Impuls fällt die gesamte Menge völlig synchron vor dir auf die Knie. Du siehst Grimassen der machtlosen Wut und Verzweiflung ob der Erkenntnis, dass selbst der Imperator sie verraten hat. In ihren Seelen, in denen einst das Licht des Imperators strahlte, herrscht nun eine klaffende Leere, die nur darauf wartet, von einem neuen Patron gefüllt zu werden. Sie alle wissen: Ihr wertloses Schicksal liegt in deinen Händen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Comme un seul homme, la foule tombe à genoux, mais sur tous les visages, vous pouvez lire la rage et le désespoir provoqués par la soudaine réalisation que l'Empereur les a abandonnés. Dans leur âme, là où brillait la lumière de l'Empereur, ne reste plus qu'un gouffre béant qui n'attend plus que d'être rempli par {mf|un nouveau bienfaiteur|une nouvelle bienfaitrice}. Désormais, leur destin repose entre vos mains, et ils en sont parfaitement conscients.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme un seul homme, la foule tombe à genoux, mais sur tous les visages, vous pouvez lire la rage et le désespoir provoqués par la soudaine réalisation que l'Empereur les a abandonnés. Dans leur âme, là où brillait la lumière de l'Empereur, ne reste plus qu'un gouffre béant qui n'attend plus que d'être rempli par {mf|un nouveau bienfaiteur|une nouvelle bienfaitrice}. Maintenant, leur destin repose entre vos mains, et ils en sont parfaitement conscients.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Savaşçılar cümbür cemaat karşında diz çöküyor. İmparator'un bile onlara ihanet ettiğini anladıklarında çaresizce öfke ve umutsuzlukla yüz ekşittiklerini görebiliyorsun. Bir zamanlar İmparator'un nuruyla aydınlanan ruhlarında artık sadece yeni bir efendinin doldurabileceği büyük bir eksiklik var. İçlerinden her biri, değersiz kaderlerinin artık sana bağlı olduğunun farkında.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a united impulse, the crowd falls to its knees before you. You see grimaces of powerless rage and despair at the realisation that even the Emperor has betrayed them. Where once the Emperor's light shone in their souls, there is now only a gaping void waiting to be filled by a new patron. Every last one of them knows that their worthless fate is in your hands.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçılar cümbür cemaat karşında diz çöküyor. İmparator'un bile onlara ihanet ettiğini anladıklarında çaresizce öfke ve umutsuzlukla yüz ekşittiklerini görebiliyorsun. Bir zamanlar İmparator'un nuruyla aydınlanan ruhlarında artık sadece yeni bir efendinin doldurabileceği büyük bir eksiklik var. İçlerinden her biri, değersiz kaderlerinin artık sana bağlı olduğunun farkında.{/n}
